Thoroughly explore the Palmtree codebase to understand the current state of:

1. packages/countapp-mcp/ - Read ALL source files. Understand the existing tools, how BaseMcpServer is used, how ctx.fetch/ctx.getFile/ctx.authToken work
2. packages/base-mcp/ - Read ALL source files. Understand the base class API
3. packages/flow-engine/ - Read key files to understand how flows are loaded, how MCP servers are spawned, how instructions are loaded
4. ~/.palmtree/ - Read ALL config files (config.yaml, auth.yaml, mcp.yaml), check flows/ directory, check instructions/ directory
5. packages/main-api/ - Understand auth delegation and file upload endpoints
6. .env and .env.example - Check current environment variables

Write a comprehensive summary to /Users/ggomes/dev/probable-palm-tree/.claude/codebase-state.md including:
- Current countapp-mcp tools and their implementations
- How base-mcp provides ctx object
- How flow-engine loads flows and instructions
- Current config file contents
- Current flow definitions
- Current instruction files
- Environment variables
- File upload mechanism (how files go from user upload to MCP tool access)
